response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its exceptional features and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a slightly higher value, reflecting its true worth and the unique benefits it provides. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 180}
